title: DOOR_SYSTEM_SET_AUTOMATIC_RATE
content:
0x03C27E13B42A0E820x4F44AF21// DoorSystemSetAutomaticRate
void DOOR_SYSTEM_SET_AUTOMATIC_RATE(Hash doorHash, float rate, BOOL requestDoor, BOOL forceUpdate);Parameters:doorHash: Door system identifierrate: requestDoor: forceUpdate: On true invokes DOOR_SYSTEM_SET_DOOR_STATE; otherwise requestDoor is unused.Includes networking check: ownership vs. or the door itself isn't networked.
codeBlocks:
// DoorSystemSetAutomaticRate
void DOOR_SYSTEM_SET_AUTOMATIC_RATE(Hash doorHash, float rate, BOOL requestDoor, BOOL forceUpdate);

-- Example usage for DOOR_SYSTEM_SET_AUTOMATIC_RATE
DoorSystemSetAutomaticRate(GetHashKey('prop'), 1.0, true, true)
